sense.def: Illness Sign identical with tong ren bu zheng 瞳人不正 , incorrect pupil position. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shen 人參 quotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 驚後瞳斜：小兒驚後瞳人不正者 , “‘ Slanted pupil resulting from fright’, this is an incorrect pupil position resulting in children following an exposure to fright”. Tong zhang 痛脹 , painful distension [8]

Illness Sign identical with zhang tong 脹痛 , distension with pain. Su wen 素問 60: 次絡季脅 引少腹而痛脹，刺譩譆 , “When the network in the lateral abdomen and free ribs pulls on the lower abdomen, resulting in painful distension , pierce the yi xi [hole]”.
